The claim was made in a Facebook post pu: 2020, and has been shared more than 9,600 times.
The post: s caption, written in Urdu and Arabic, translates to English as "Holiday of holy Friday. Hello and welcome."
The post features an image of a purporte: an unverified Facebook page, which includes a photo of Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan and states that the weekly holiday will change from Sunday to Friday starting from March 1.
Firdous Ashiq Awan: a government spokeswoman and Special Assistant to the Prime Minister, denied the claim and stated that there is no proposal before the Federal Cabinet about changing the weekly holiday.
